text: Clayton Pisani (born 31 July 1978) is a Maltese professional football referee.Profile He has been a full international for FIFA since 2009.FIFA. "Malta: Referees". He first started refereeing in 1994, and graduated with in Physical Education in 2002.http://www.inewsmalta.com/article.php?ID1=66143 He retired with immediate effect on May 9, 2018. http://www.inewsmalta.com/article.php?ID1=66143 == References == Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Maltese football referees
title: Clayton Pisani
